testcase.name: Valid Registration
testcase.system-out: When user navigates to website url..........................................passed And Click on Register Tab...................................................passed And select gender option....................................................passed And user enters "Passant" as a first name, "Hamed" as a last name, "Passant@Hamed.com" as an email.passed And Select Day, Month and Year..............................................passed And fill "Google" as company name...........................................passed And fill "123456" as a password and "123456" as a confirm password..........passed And clicks on Register......................................................passed Then user could successfully register.......................................passed

testcase.name: Valid Login
testcase.system-out: When user navigates to website url..........................................passed And clicks on Login tab.....................................................passed And user enters "Passant@Hamed.com" as an email and "123456" as a password..passed And clicks on Login.........................................................passed Then user could successfully logged in......................................passed

testcase.name: Valid Category Selection
testcase.system-out: When user navigates to website url..........................................passed And user hovers on Computers category.......................................passed And clicks on Notebooks.....................................................passed Then user should be directed to Notebooks page..............................passed

testcase.name: Search by Product Name
testcase.system-out: When user navigates to website url..........................................passed And inputs "Lumia" as a product Name on search field........................passed And hits Enter..............................................................passed Then product should be displayed............................................passed

testcase.name: Search by Product SKU
testcase.system-out: When user navigates to website url..........................................passed And inputs "N_1020_LU" as a product SKU on search field.....................passed And hits Enter..............................................................passed Then product should be displayed............................................passed

testcase.classname: User could add items to wishlist
testcase.name: user could add HTC ONE M8 phone to wishlist
testcase.system-out: When user navigates to website url..........................................passed And clicks on wishlist icon under HTC ONE M8 phone..........................passed Then Notification success message should be displayed.......................passed And Notification success message color is green.............................passed And HTC ONE M8 phone should be added to WishList Page.......................passed And when add more of the item, the count increased..........................passed
